column5: Hi everyone, Newly posting to this community. Great site and have enjoyed browsing it for a while. I've looked around and it seems that on this site people seem very decent and respectable about what and how they post, that's great. I'm a 36 year old Timberframe / Natural Builder living in the Brockville area. Fishing and hunting have been lifetime passions for me, only succeeded by my growing family, wife, 2 daughters and another on the way in April. Love all kinds of fishing and of course have some limitations due to time. Steelhead on the east tribs has to be my spring favourite and I'm looking forward to getting going here shortly, as a number of you are I'm sure. I actually enjoy seeing all the people packed on those small rivers. Shows that as people we can get along for the most part , enjoying a common passion for perfectly created outdoors. Looking forward to becoming an active member on this board and possibly hooking up with some of you sometime to have some good fun Out There! All the best. Oliver
welcome to the board oliver!!!  Everybody here loves pictures!  Cheers!
Welcome to OFC  Oliver.  Stick around, you'll become addicted in no time - if you're not already.
Welcome Oliver! You will find that its a great group of people; in a way, the boards are like that crowded creekbank- without the snags.    I second Rich, you will be hooked before you know it!
What he said^^^^^^^^  I'm sure you have a few teasers to show us???  cheers Streamerguy
Thanks for the welcom, I get the pics hint. I'll be loading some shortly. Oliver
Welcome to the OFC Community Oliver. Always good to see a new member join in the fun.
Howdy, Oliver, and welcome.  Pay no attention to the short furry man behind the curtain.
Welcome to OFC man, as for photos save your self time and space on the board and use Photobucket. Can't wait to see some spring reports!  http://photobucket.com/  Goood luck out there
Welcome aboard now never forget your camera and extra batteries.We like to see fish pics.
Thanks again, thanks for the photobucket tip. Am in the process of loading some up now.
Welcome! Looking forward to some reports.
Welcome oliver look forward to reading your reports  Rob
Welcome - I have got to say that you joined one great forum. Great people, Great information.
